Original: Yo, fresh meat. How are you liking the
bar in this city?
[Page]
After you guys are done sightseeing,
head to the [Color:5]Mark Grand Court[Color:0] and
accept a [Color:5]mission[Color:0].
Translation: Yo, fresh meat. How are you liking the
bar in this city?
[Page]
After you guys are done sightseeing,
head to the [Color:5]Mark Grand Court[Color:0] and
accept a [Color:5]mission[Color:0].

Original: Looks like you've taken on a mission.
Alright, let me teach you some basic
common knowledge.
[Page]
Listen... the paths through dungeons
aren't always obvious.
[Page]
If you see a wall that looks a little
different, stop and take a closer
look. There may be a [Color:5]secret passage[Color:0].
[Page]
If you find a secret passage and mark
it on your map, it'll make exploring
much easier. Trust me.
[Page]
I expect you guys to pass that down
the line once you're senior explorers.
That's how this stuff gets taught.
